content.rendered:
Euro 2021 Semi-Finals & Final Rates

The rates below are based on a package including seven nights accommodations, entry level tickets to both semi-finals and the championship final and more. You can further customize your packages with tickets to additional matches, ticket upgrades, extra nights, room upgrades and other add-ons.
HotelsPackages From
Park Plaza Westminster Bridge
$14,935
Mandarin Oriental Hyde Park$18,615
Contact our sports travel specialists for your custom trip quote.
*Rates are per person in USD based on double occupancy. Single occupancy rates are available. Triple and Quad occupancy may be available. A 50% deposit will hold your spot. Final balance is due 90 days prior to travel. Rates include all local and state taxes. Availability and pricing subject to change prior to booking.

Euro 2021 Follow Your Team Rates

Our Euro 2021 Follow Your Team packages are yours to customize. You choose your preferred hotel level, the matches you want to see, your seating category, and any other extras to complete your experience, then we will personalize an itinerary that is tailor-made for you.
PackagePackages From
Custom Follow-Your-Team Package$4,095
Contact our sports travel specialists for your custom trip quote.
*Rates are per person in USD based on double occupancy. Single occupancy rates are available. Triple and Quad occupancy may be available. A 50% deposit will hold your spot. Final balance is due 90 days prior to travel. Rates include all local and state taxes. Availability and pricing subject to change prior to booking.
